TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Fafokod, title = Fafokod, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fafokod} }

S.FORM: alang Fafokod ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Hikasiki go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 454 buwan, 1,127 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 70% kyan ku 784 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 30% kyan ku 343 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 66%, Paywan 1%, Puyuma 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Fafokod hya' ga Alapawan. tay mkyahu' na Fafokod hya' ga Kalifangar. tay 'zil na Fafokod hya' ga Ma'olaway. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. khu skwan biru maki 1 khu skwan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Fafokod ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Hikasiki go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 454 bowan, 1,127 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 70% kyan ko 784 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 30% kyan ko 343 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 66%, Paywan 1%, Poyoma 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Fafokod hya' ga Alapawan. tay mkyaho' na Fafokod hya' ga Kalifangar. tay 'zil na Fafokod hya' ga Ma'olaway. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. kho skwan biro maki 1 kho skwan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
